content.rendered:
Automation Testing means using an automation tool to execute your test case suite. The automation software can also enter test data into the System Under Test, compare expected and actual results and generate detailed test reports. Selenim WebDriver is mostly use to automate Software Testing with best result. Selenium WebDriver is being need in the filed of Software Testing has good career opportunity.

Vmaxinfo Instituteprovide Selenium WebDriver course for Automation Software Testing which has wide career scope in I.T. industries. Individual attention given to every student which gain valuable knowledge to every student.

Automation Testing Course

Selenium IDE
Java Basics
Selenium Webdriver
Setting up the environment for testing with Webdriver
Running a simple test with Webdriver
TestNG
Finding elements with Xpath and id
Developer tools (Firebug, Firepath)
Multi Browser Testing
Switching between frames and iframes
Handling alerts
Selenium Grid
Browserstack Automation
